title: Load bearing elements of construction and elements of construction for which the required fire resistance is one hour or more shall be of non-combustible material
clause_text: Load bearing elements of construction and elements of construction for which the required fire resistance is one hour or more shall be of non-combustible material. Interior finish materials (wall paneling, floor coverings etc.) may be permitted of materials having their rating for flame spread and smoke developed not exceeding a very low flame spread limit in accordance with IS:1642,1960 (Class I) Ceiling linings shall be non-combustible or of plasterboard. Stairways and corridors shall not contain combustible materials.
